definition: Emperor Gaozong of Tang, reign name of third Tang emperor Li Zhi 李治[Li3 Zhi4] (628-683), reigned 649-683
to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
Tang dynasty (618-907)/surname Tang
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao
surname Zong
school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

sentences.english: So Gaozong ordered "both the jade wind initiatives, and appropriate cut-off."
sentences.chinese: 所以唐高宗下令“既玷风猷，并宜禁断”。

sentences.english: The emperor expressed appreciation to Xue for helping him survive the disaster and awarded Xue with a royal horse.
sentences.chinese: 躲过大难，唐高宗感激薛仁贵，特赐薛仁贵御马一匹。

definition: Emperor Zhongzong of Tang, reign name of fourth Tang emperor Li Zhe 李哲[Li3 Zhe2] (656-710), reigned 705-710
